body_html:
Good catch. Yes, this seems to be a (very subtle) off-by-one error. Since it only seems to affect the end of every batch, it's effect should almost be negligible (especially for larger batches).

@soloice, could you please post the output on the same example sentence with your fix, and if it solves the problem we can accept a pull request to fix it?

body:
Good catch. Yes, this seems to be a (very subtle) off-by-one error. Since it only seems to affect the end of every batch, it's effect should almost be negligible (especially for larger batches). 

@soloice, could you please post the output on the same example sentence with your fix, and if it solves the problem we can accept a pull request to fix it?
